text: "Turn the Page" is a 1973 song by Bob Seger. It was taken from his sixth studio album Back in '72. It was not released as a single until 1976 when it was released as a single from the live album Live Bullet. It became a mainstay on the classic rock radio stations since its release. ==Metallica cover== Heavy metal band Metallica covered Turn the Page for their 1998 compilation album Garage Inc.. It went to number 22 in New Zealand, number 11 in Norway and Australia, number 19 in Austria, number 5 in Canada, number 13 in Sweden, number 7 in Finland and number 42 in the Netherlands. It also topped the single charts on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. title: Turn the Page (Bob Seger song)
